KB3101526 patches a common file (VISSHE.DLL) in Office 2010 suite
If you just wish to update Office 2010 to the latest state. We
recommended you to install updates in this order: (1) the targetdir
update (KB2825640). (2) Service Pack. Then (3) install updates from
the latest released to the earliest. This is because an update for
Office 2010 might contain multiple .msp packages. And for each
package applied a copy of the old files before which are patched will
be stored onto your disk. This wastes space unless you used this
method so that earlier .msp packages will detect the newer files and
skip itself. Later .msp packages always contain files patched in the
earlier update of the same name. But an update file (.exe) does not
always contain all .msp packages released in earlier updates of the
